author: markbrus88
title: Arsenal line up surprise ÂŁ13million Rui Patricio transfer
text:
Portugal goalkeeper Rui Patricio is said to be in Arsenal’s sights (Picture: Getty) Arsenal are reportedly lining up a ÂŁ13million bid to seal the transfer of Sporting Lisbon goalkeeper Rui Patricio in a surprise summer move.
Rumour Mill: our round-up of football gossip, rumours and speculation The Gunners already have an established big name in Petr Cech as their number one, but may be justifiably unconvinced by his performances for much of this season.
Despite some fine form when he arrived at Arsenal from Chelsea last season, the 34-year-old now arguably looks past his peak and has been unable to help the club through a rough patch of form.
Patricio, 29, has shone for Sporting Lisbon (Picture: Getty) Petr Cech hasn’t been at his best this season (Picture: Getty) Reports in France now claim Arsenal are stepping up their interest in Patricio ahead of the summer, with the 29-year-old supposedly available for a bargain fee.
More: Football ÂŁ50m Prem star perfect for back three decides on summer move to Chelsea

Marseille are also mentioned as admirers, but Arsenal could be lining up an offer of ÂŁ13million to bring the Portuguese shot-stopper to the Emirates Stadium, according to RMC .
The Sporting star won Euro 2016 with his national side last summer, and has long been linked with a move to a bigger club.
